title: Solve for $$x$$ from (3). $$x=21-6y+8z$$. Substitute this $$x$$ value into (1) and (2).
(1) becomes $$-32y+43z=-85$$ (4) and (2) becomes $$-16y+13z=-51$$ (5). Multiply (5) by $$2$$ so that $$y-coefficients$$ are equal. Then, subtract this new equation from (4). Solve for $$z$$.
Using $$z$$, substitute back into original equation (5), solve for $$y$$.
